DataElement.preferredName: Patient Admission Light Avoidance Room Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether or not an individual was admitted to a room prepared for strict light avoidance.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Admission Visible Light Avoidance Room
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The condition of being allowed to enter._Perceptible especially by the eye; open to easy view._Electromagnetic radiation in the portion of the spectrum from about 380 nm (violet) to 800 nm (red)._A conscious or unconscious refusal to encounter situations, activities, or objects; the act or practice of keeping away from or withdrawing from something._An area within a building enclosed by walls and floor and ceiling.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The condition of being allowed to enter.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Electromagnetic radiation in the portion of the spectrum from about 380 nm (violet) to 800 nm (red).:A conscious or unconscious refusal to encounter situations, activities, or objects; the act or practice of keeping away from or withdrawing from something.:An area within a building enclosed by walls and floor and ceiling.

Concepts.definition: Electromagnetic radiation in the portion of the spectrum from about 380 nm (violet) to 800 nm (red).
A conscious or unconscious refusal to encounter situations, activities, or objects; the act or practice of keeping away from or withdrawing from something.
An area within a building enclosed by walls and floor and ceiling.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
